sys_script_client.description: Set the Requester to the currently logged in user for new Wish Item records. Users can change the field value.
sys_script_client.name: Wish Item Set Requester

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_client_57f8210a07500110bce2f7fc7c1ed067
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script_client"><sys_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><condition/><description>Set the Requester to the currently logged in user for new Wish Item records. Users can change the field value.
</description><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Wish Item Set Requester</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
  
  //Check if the form is for a new record.  If it is a new record, 
  //set the Requester value to the currently logged in user.
  
  if(g_form.isNewRecord()){
    g_form.setValue('requester',g_user.userID);
  }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-09 18:46:39</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>57f8210a07500110bce2f7fc7c1ed067</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Wish Item Set Requester</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Wish List " source="x_703073_wish_list">1bda110e07100110bce2f7fc7c1ed0a5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Wish List ">1bda110e07100110bce2f7fc7c1ed0a5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_client_57f8210a07500110bce2f7fc7c1ed067</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-09 18:46:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><view/></sys_script_client></record_update>
